short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that allows you to edit text on any website. Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and popular news website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power to edit any webpage with the Edit Anything any website Extension! Whether you need to modify text, experiment with layout changes, or simply make a webpage more visually appealing, this extension gives you the tools to do it. 

Key Features:

Editable Content: all text on any webpage becomes editable, allowing you to make on-the-fly changes.
Toggle Functionality: Easily switch the extension on and off with a simple button in the popup.
Customizable Interface: The popup interface provides clear instructions and a user-friendly experience.
